title: Birth and death of mountains
creator_credit: BFA Educational Media, Film Associates and Paul Burnford
brief_description: Shows the forces that wear down mountains and those that cause mountains to be formed. Uses drawings to demonstrate formations of fold mountains, new faultblock mountains and new dome mountains. Observes the mountain-flattening forces of glaciers, wind and water. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
